title: BS 7671 Earth Fault Loop Impedance (Zs) Calculator

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Loop impedance from components and temperature: $$ Z_s \;=\; Z_e \;+\; (R_1 + R_2)_{20^\circ\!C}\,\big[\,1 + \alpha\,(T - 20^\circ\!C)\,\big] $$ Prospective earth fault current (conservative): $$ I_f \;=\; \frac{C_{\min}\,U_0}{Z_s} $$ Maximum permissible Zs based on instantaneous operation: $$ Z_{s,\text{max}} \;=\; \frac{C_{\min}\,U_0}{I_a}, \qquad I_a = k\,I_n $$ with typical conservative multipliers for MCBs: \(k = 5\) (Type B), \(10\) (Type C), \(20\) (Type D). For precise values use BS 7671 tables or manufacturer curves.
